name: ↑🐱↑
description:
Made for #TweetTweetJam 7

::_::p,x,m,t,s,d=1,0,128,0,2,false r,c,ax,ay,n=rnd,cos,{},{},btnp for i=0,3do ax[i]=1ay[i]=i*32 if(r(2)>1)ax[i]=-1end ::o::cls()if d then ?"game over",46,3 ?"score: "..flr(t),44,9 if(n(4))goto _ else s+=.005 t+=s if(n(4)and abs(x))p*=-1 x=mid(x+p/9*s,-1,1) for b=t%6-6,m,6do srand(b-t) ?"█",23-r(2),b,5 ?"█",99+r(3),b ?"▒",18-r(2),b ?"▒",103+r(3),b end ?"🐱",61+x*30,99-9*c(x/4),9 for i=0,3do h=ay[i]<99ay[i]+=s b=ay[i]j=b<99 if(h!=j and ax[i]==x)d=true if(b>m)then ay[i]-=m if(r()>.5)ax[i]*=-1end ?"✽",61+ax[i]*30*c(min(1,.5+b/90)),b end end flip()goto o
